import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect } from "react" import * as BooksAPI from "./BooksAPI" import { useState } from "react"; import Select from "react-select"; const ListBooks = ({books}) => { console.log("this is the listbooks component: ") console.log(books) const options = [ { value: 'currentlyReading', label: 'Currently Reading' }, { value: 'read', label: 'Read' }, { value: 'wantToRead', label: 'Want To Read' }, { value: 'none', label: 'None' } ] return(

MyReads

Currently Reading

    { books.filter(book => book.shelf == "currentlyReading").map(filteredBook => (
  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card

Want to Read

  1. 1776
    David McCullough
  2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
    J.K. Rowling

Read

  1. The Hobbit
    J.R.R. Tolkien
  2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
    Seuss
  3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
    Mark Twain
Add a book
) } export default ListBooks;
